remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.HostingPrintQueue%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "HostingPrintQueue", not "PrintQueue" or "Hostingprintqueue".

For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.HostingPrintQueue%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "HostingPrintQueue", not "PrintQueue" or "Hostingprintqueue".
